SysFileSetPos (FUN)
SysFileSetPos (FUN)
Â¶
FUNCTION SysFileSetPos : RTS_IEC_RESULT
Set the file pointer to the specified position
InOut:
Scope
Name
Type
Comment
Return
SysFileSetPos
RTS_IEC_RESULT
Returns the runtime system error code (see
CmpErrors.library)
Input
hFile
RTS_IEC_HANDLE
Handle of the file
ulOffset
__XWORD
Offset to set from the beginning of the file
